lines.text: Now the question is, can we get the shit back into the horse?

Chairman Dodge, please! Would you tell him that it's Mr. Joshua Benjamin from the NAACP on the line! Actually Mame, you could be a great deal of help, I have a few minor questions. I would like to know how many members of the Chairman's committee are African American?... None... Well, surely, there must be a Latino member on the committee... No Latinos either... Ah! Does ah! the Chairman have any Asians or Native Americans on the Committee? No Asians and no Natives. Does the Chairman have any Handicaps or Gays on the Committee? No Gays. Well, thank you mame, you've been a great deal of help. Just forget I even called. Just tell him I said 'hi'.
Don't you love this Chairman? He's brought dignity back to the name Dick. No longer is it Tricky! Come on... Dick is Good! Dick is Good!
Hey, yo, Van Dyke!
Yeah?
Y'all remember Willie Sutton?
My hero.
What did he say when they asked him why he robbed banks?
'Cause that's where the money is.
Oh, well, I'm very flattered, Mr Chairman.
Dick.
Well, I'm very flattered, Mr Dick.
No, no, no, no.
Oh, I'm sorry, Chairman Dick.
No, Dick. Just Dick.
Oh, Just Dick. Just Plain Old Dick.
Yeah.
Oh, fine.
Terry, tell me something. With all this money coming in from both sides, how does anything ever get done?
It doesn't. That's the genius of the system.
Come on, Thomas! You're Dick Dodge's yes-man.
I am not a yes-man. When Dick says no, I say no.
[pretending to be Zeke Bridges]
I'm madder than a Baptist in a brothel, you som-bitch!
I tell ya, I'm bout as crazy as a dog in a hubcap factory.
[trying to bribe Congressman Dodge]
This could mean six figures, Dick.
[Dick Dodge raises his eyebrows]

[smiling]
HIGH six figures.
[Dodge raises his eyebrows twice]

[frowning]
SEVEN figures?
[blackmailing Congressman Dodge]
I want you to resign. You can tell people it's for health reasons. Most of us will believe that, cuz we've seen you in the steam room.
HEY, hey, hey, hey, HEY, hey, hey!

[to Celia Kirby]
This is your uncle?
Yes, my niece tells me you're not HALF as slimy as I thought. That puts you somewhere between a lizard and a toad. Ha ha. Quite a step up, huh?
Thank you very much. Forgive me for staring. I don't know how I missed the family resemblance. She's you in a skirt.
Well I've got to do something to help these people.
Don't tell me you're actually developing a conscience.
God I hope not, it's gonna be a fuckin' nuisance in Congress.

[to Thomas Johnson]
And you! You better be very, very quiet in there, my friend. I've got the goods on you, and it would be my pleasure to leave tire marks all over you.
Ask you to vote for Jeff Johnson. Good old Jeff. The name that you can trust. The name that you know. Jeff Johnson.

We're not going to show you Jeff Johnson waving a flag. We're not going to show you Jeff Johnson kissing babies. We're not going to show you Jeff Johnson doing anything because you already know what Jeff Johnson can do. Tomorrow, vote Jeff Johnson. The name you know.
